Toothbrush with Multiple Heads: A toothbrush that has multiple brush heads on the same handle, allowing users to switch between different brushing modes or brush different areas of the mouth with different brushing styles.
Toothbrush with UV Light: A toothbrush that emits UV light to help kill bacteria and germs on the bristles, ensuring a more effective cleaning.
Toothbrush with Replaceable Brush Heads: A toothbrush that allows users to replace the brush head when it wears out, extending the life of the toothbrush and reducing waste.
Toothbrush with Built-in Timer: A toothbrush with a built-in timer that encourages users to brush for the dentist-recommended two minutes, ensuring a thorough cleaning.
Toothbrush with Voice-Activated Commands: A toothbrush that can be controlled by voice commands, allowing users to start and stop brushing without touching the brush.
